Key Match Events: Lucas Erceg's scoreless streak ended during the Guardians' four-run seventh inning.
Vinnie Pasquantino homered in the first inning and achieved his first career four-hit game.
Bo Naylor hit his 11th home run of the year in the seventh inning.
Post-Match Reflections: Royals first baseman Vinnie Pasquantino expressed that the series proves it’s going to be a fun month.
Manager Matt Quatraro reflected on the series win and the ongoing division race, stating that the team will go back and forth.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Kansas City drops one game behind Cleveland in the American League Central.
The Royals clinched the season series against the Guardians, now ahead 7-3 with three more games to play next week in Kansas City.
